actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Comnerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Comnerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to require probation in cases of certain marijuana offenders and to remove in certain cases the age restrictions on the expunging of certain official records.

summary.text: Requires, under the Controlled Substances Act, probation in cases of specified marihuana convicted first offenders. Removes in specified cases the age restrictions on the expunging of certain official records under such Act. (Amends 21 U.S.C. 844)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to require probation in cases of certain marijuana offenders and to remove in certain cases the age restrictions on the expunging of certain official records.
